# What is Advent of Code? 

Advent of Code is an advent calendar of coding challenges that has been running since 2015, founded and maintained by software engineer Eric Wastl.

<h1><a href="https://adventofcode.com/" style="color: #00cc00; text-shadow: 0 0 1px #00cc00, 0 0 3px #00cc00;">
  Go to Advent of Code
</a></h1>

Each day - for the first 12 days of December - there will be a small coding puzzle that can be solved using any programming language. Each puzzle contains a fictional backstory that is the same for all participants, but each person receives a different piece of input data and should generate a different correct result.

You don't submit your code - just the answer to the puzzle. If you get it correct, you get a gold star.
